name: Push-Up
description: A basic push-up routine.
instructions: Do 10 reps, 3 sets. Keep your body in a straight line, engage your core, and lower your chest to just above the ground before pushing back up.

name: Deadlift
description: A challenging deadlift workout targeting your back and legs.
instructions: Perform 5 reps, 4 sets. Keep your back straight, hinge at your hips, and lift the weight by driving through your heels.

name: Squats
description: A leg workout focusing on squats to build strength.
instructions: Do 12 reps, 3 sets. Lower your hips until your thighs are parallel to the ground, keep your knees aligned with your toes, and push back up.

name: Pull-Ups
description: An upper-body workout focusing on pull-ups to strengthen your back.
instructions: Perform 8 reps, 4 sets. Grip the bar shoulder-width apart, engage your lats, and pull your chin above the bar before lowering back down with control.

name: Chest Press
description: A chest workout that focuses on the bench press for upper body strength.
instructions: Do 10 reps, 3 sets. Lower the weight slowly to your chest, keep your elbows at a 45-degree angle, and push up explosively.

name: Dumbbell Rows
description: A workout for your upper back, arms, and shoulders.
instructions: Do 10 reps, 3 sets per arm. Keep your back straight, pull the dumbbell towards your torso, and squeeze your shoulder blades at the top.

name: Lunges
description: A lower-body workout that focuses on leg strength.
instructions: Perform 12 reps, 3 sets per leg. Step forward, lower your back knee towards the ground, and push through your front heel to return.

name: Bicep Curls
description: A classic bicep workout to build arm strength.
instructions: Do 12 reps, 3 sets. Keep your elbows close to your torso, curl the weights up while squeezing your biceps, and lower slowly.

name: Running
description: A quick cardio routine for beginners or experienced runners.
instructions: Run for 20 minutes at a moderate pace. Maintain an upright posture, relax your shoulders, and control your breathing.

name: HIIT Sprint
description: A high-intensity interval training sprint routine for fat loss.
instructions: Perform 30-second sprints followed by 1-minute rest, for 10 rounds. Drive with your knees, pump your arms, and go all out on sprints.

name: Jump Rope
description: A full-body cardio workout with jump rope.
instructions: Jump rope for 2 minutes, rest for 30 seconds, repeat 5 times. Stay on the balls of your feet and keep your core engaged.

name: Cycling
description: An indoor cycling workout to improve stamina and endurance.
instructions: Cycle for 30 minutes at a steady pace. Keep your cadence smooth and adjust resistance as needed.

name: Swimming
description: A total body workout that's easy on your joints.
instructions: Swim for 20 minutes, alternating strokes. Focus on smooth strokes and controlled breathing.

name: Stair Climber
description: A great cardio workout using the stair climber machine.
instructions: Climb for 20 minutes, maintaining a steady pace. Keep your back straight and avoid leaning on the handles.

name: Boxing
description: A cardio workout combining punching with footwork for a full-body workout.
instructions: Box for 3 minutes, rest for 1 minute, repeat for 5 rounds. Keep your hands up, move your feet, and throw controlled punches.

name: Rowing
description: A low-impact cardio workout using a rowing machine.
instructions: Row for 20 minutes at a steady pace. Push with your legs, lean back slightly, and pull the handle towards your chest.

name: Yoga Flow
description: A relaxing yoga flow for flexibility and balance.
instructions: Hold each pose for 30 seconds, flow through for 20 minutes. Breathe deeply and move smoothly between poses.

name: Hamstring Stretch
description: A stretch for your hamstrings to improve flexibility.
instructions: Hold for 30 seconds per leg. Keep your back straight and lean forward gently.

name: Cat-Cow Pose
description: A yoga pose that stretches your back and shoulders.
instructions: Flow between Cat and Cow for 1 minute. Move slowly, inhale when arching, exhale when rounding your back.

name: Quad Stretch
description: A stretch for your quadriceps to increase flexibility in your legs.
instructions: Hold for 30 seconds per leg. Keep your knees close and balance by holding onto a wall if needed.

name: Cobra Pose
description: A yoga pose that stretches the chest and spine.
instructions: Hold for 30 seconds. Keep your shoulders relaxed and press your chest forward.

name: Downward Dog
description: A stretch that improves flexibility in your hips and legs.
instructions: Hold for 30 seconds. Keep your feet together and gently press your body up.

name: Seated Forward Fold
description: A yoga stretch that targets the hamstrings and lower back.
instructions: Hold for 30 seconds. Keep your back straight and reach towards your feet.

name: Child's Pose
description: A restful yoga pose that stretches the back and hips.
instructions: Hold for 1 minute. Relax your arms and let your forehead rest on the mat.
